column5: Not on offer 2022/2023Our MSc Cyber Risk for Business (CRB) programme is offered by the College of Business & Law at UCC. This programme provides our students with the skills required to become IS security analysts, IS risk auditors and to understand IS and data governance and project management. In addition, you will graduate with a portfolio of business and project management skills, as well as enhanced knowledge of IS concepts and core technical skills.
column7: The EU fee for this course is €10,630.  The Non-EU fee for this course is €18,490.
